definition: generic term for birds and animals/birds/to capture (old)

sentences.english: Ideally, people culling and disposing of birds should have protective equipment.
sentences.chinese: 宰杀和处理禽类的人应该配备保护装置。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to an automatically drinking device for fowls, which is made of nontoxic plastics.
sentences.chinese: 本实用新型涉及一种家禽类饲养自动饮水器。

sentences.english: Tinned meat and poultry is up 47%.
What poultry dishes do you serve?
Transmission of the vaccine virus to non-immunized birds should be avoided.
sentences.chinese: 须避免将疫苗病毒传给未免疫的禽类。

sentences.english: At room temperature with roast or grilled meats, game, poultry, pizzas and pastas.
sentences.chinese: 室温下搭配烤肉，野味，禽类，匹萨和意大利均可。

sentences.english: Pairs well with red meats, poultry, terrines and cheese. Wine Enthusiast – 88 points.
sentences.chinese: 非常适宜搭配红肉，禽类，沙锅菜及乳酪。

sentences.english: Well suited to game, flavorful poultry or hearty casserole.
sentences.chinese: 适合搭配野味，味浓的禽类或沙锅菜。

sentences.english: This wine will be ideal with grilled meat and poultry.
sentences.chinese: 此酒完美搭配烧烤肉类及家禽类菜肴。

sentences.english: The wine pairs well with red meat based dishes as well poultry. It is also a fine accompaniment to cheeses.
sentences.chinese: 与红肉及家禽类菜色最为配合，同时也可与芝士搭配。

sentences.english: Gastronomic coupling: venison dishes, white meat dishes and all cheeses.
sentences.chinese: 适宜搭配家禽类菜肴，白肉和所有的奶酪。

sentences.english: Ideal to combine with meats, poultry, pizzas and pastas.
sentences.chinese: 适宜搭配肉类，禽类，批萨和意大利面。

sentences.english: Ideal with shellfish, fish, white meats in cream sauce and poultry.
sentences.chinese: 最宜与贝类，鱼肉，奶油白肉及禽类搭配。

sentences.english: It goes very well with temporary cuisine, a variety of strong tasting cheeses as well as pork meat and poultry.
sentences.chinese: 可用于烹饪和搭配口味重的乳酪，猪肉和禽类。

sentences.english: Pairs well with red meats, poultry, terrines and cheese.
sentences.chinese: 非常适宜搭配红肉，禽类，沙锅菜及乳酪。

sentences.english: There is no risk of getting avian influenza from properly cooked poultry and eggs.
sentences.chinese: 食用经过适当烹制的禽类和蛋类不会染上禽流感。

definition: generic term for birds and animals/birds/to capture (old)
